title: Looking for Silver/Gold top laner
body:
Hey guys,

I'm in the process of building a ranked team for silvers and golds.
Not trying to get to challenger but would like to be on regularly and have a couple of play sessions a week.
Add me in game on Krispy Meme, would love to have a chat!

Thanks~

replies.body:
PICK ME PICK ME
{{champion:17}} main plz sir
